main event: An unidentified object was observed in Springfield, Massachusetts on February 8, 1961, described as possibly ball-shaped and erratic in movement.
interesting points: The observation lasted for approximately 3-5 minutes., The object had a cylindrical cone-like tail and was bluish-white with a reddish tail., Witness was a machinist from Smith and Wesson., There was no sound associated with the object during the sighting., The observation took place on a clear night with calm surface conditions.
